pr_title: HDDS-3638. Add a cat command to show the text of a file in the Ozone server

timeline.message: HDDS-3638. Add a cat command to show the text of a file in the Ozone server

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                description = "Cat a specific key from ozone server")
          
          
            
                description = "Copies a specific Ozone key to standard output")
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.bodyText: Should we consider a small copy buffer size like (4k) instead of default OZONE_SCM_CHUNK_SIZE_DEFAULT(4M) for better memory efficiency?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

timeline.message: HDDS-3638. Address comments, modify the default chunk size.

timeline.bodyText: This will use 4KB buffer only if chunk size is not configured, which I don't think can happen.  I guess @xiaoyuyao's intention was to always use 4KB buffer, regardless of chunk size setting.
timeline.author: adoroszlai
